== About the Emulator ==

{
	"icons" : [
		["PCE Home Page",    "hyperlink",   "http://www.hampa.ch/pce"]

	"class" : "float-right"

The IBM PC emulator is a JavaScript port of Hampa Hug's PCE (PC Emulator)[1].
The Javascript port is based on work done by James Friend[2]
